title: Ukraine Signals It Will Stay on the Offensive, Despite Talk of a Lull
description: Many analysts and diplomats have suggested there could be a pause in major combat, and even peace talks, over the winter, but after pushing the Russians out of Kherson, Ukraine has no desire to stop.
dc:creator: Carlotta Gall
media:credit: Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
media:description: Ukrainian soldiers in the village of Snihurivka, in southern Ukraine, on Thursday, the day after Russia formally announced it had retreated from villages along the Kherson front.
